name: Brushed (Post-Jam Edition)
description:
Welcome to Brushed, a chill game where you play as a die, rolling around a canvas to make beautiful works of art. This game was made as part of the GMTK 2022 Game jam, and all assets in the game were created from scratch within the game jam time limit (including music, sfx, graphics, game mechanics, etc) by the Fuzzy Camel team.

Controls:

WASD = Move / Paint canvas

Q E = Rotate Camera

Esc = Pause/Reset Level

If you get stuck on a level, you can reset the canvas via the pause menu.
